#: DIVIDE WIND IN DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS - CASE INPUT FILE            #
+ csvFile // string // name of the csv file                                            #
o nb_dir // float // number of divisions into the wind rose = number of directions     #
o nom_epw // string // name of the csv file containing the wind directions and speeds  #
o path_csv_write // string // path to the folder where the output csv will be written  #
o name_csv_write // string // general name for the output csv (multiple)               #
* o = obligatory // + = if an optional division is wanted                                #
-To comment: create a dict entry with '#' key                                          #
-All the entries are written as python dict and are separated by a comma               #
